templateDescription: VP-level executive with 35 O*NET Skills + 30 Abilities + 10 Work Styles + 15 Unique Differentiators across Strategy, Aviation, Music, Advocacy, and Entrepreneurship

profile.name: Cliff Jones
profile.currentTitle: VP Global Strategy, GM Customer Advisory & Futurist
profile.executiveSummary: Accomplished strategic executive with 25+ years driving transformational change in enterprise talent technology. Proven track record of architecting AI-first solutions that deliver measurable business impact while building high-performing teams and stakeholder relationships. Combines deep technical fluency with strategic foresight to position organizations at the forefront of emerging trends. Co-founder of three ventures including Second Chance Foundation, the world's only aviation-focused mental health and recovery organization.

evidence.description: Predicted ATS market obsolescence in 2019, validated by 2023 market consolidation
evidence.outcome: Enabled TalentEdge to pivot product strategy 3 years ahead, capturing $25M revenue

evidence.description: Resolved $2.5M customer crisis in 48 hours coordinating 4 teams
evidence.outcome: Retained customer, expanded contract by $1.2M, CEO became CAB member

evidence.description: Engine failure emergency at 7,000 feet—executed flawless emergency landing
evidence.outcome: All passengers safe, FAA commended decision-making

values.name: Intellectual Integrity
values.description: Pursue truth over confirmation. Evidence-based decisions, always. Challenge assumptions before accepting conclusions.

values.name: Strategic Foresight Over Reaction
values.description: Anticipate market shifts 18-24 months early. Lead change, don't follow it. 85-95% predictive accuracy through pattern recognition.

values.name: Radical Transparency
values.description: Share hard truths directly and kindly. Reality-based planning wins. Confront problems early, not late.

values.name: Outcome-Focused Excellence
values.description: Judge by impact delivered, not activity performed. Results drive everything. Measure outcomes, not effort.

values.name: Elegant Simplicity
values.description: Distill complexity into clarity. Deep understanding enables simple solutions. Make sophisticated insights accessible.

values.name: Authentic, Human Leadership
values.description: Lead with vulnerability and truth. Strength through self-awareness. Use personal experience to build trust and reduce stigma.

purpose: I help organizations navigate transformation through strategic foresight and evidence-based decision making. Using pattern recognition and predictive frameworks, I enable leaders to see market shifts 18-24 months early and make proactive choices. My diverse background—from single-pilot IFR operations to nonprofit founding to professional music—provides unique perspectives on high-stakes decision making, crisis leadership, and authentic human connection. I lead with transparency and use personal experience with recovery to build trust that enables honest discourse about complex challenges.
